entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
